short_summary: Canadian Institutes of Health Research needs a change management consultant to provide group intervention, facilitation, and mediation services.
description: Canadian Institutes of Health Research needs a change management consultant to provide group intervention and facilitation/mediation services and recommendations to assist in the continuous enhancement and change management of Canadian Institutes of Health Research (CIHR)
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Title
Change Management Consultant (Team) Level 1,2,3

## Tender Information

* Reference Number: PW-22-01005327
* Solicitation Number: 182406-RFP-TSPS-CIHR
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-09-08T14:00:00
* Publication Date: 2022-08-25

## Background

The Canadian Institutes of Health Research (CIHR) is seeking a Change Management Consultant (Team) to provide expert services in the areas of change management, group facilitation, and mediation. The consultant will be working closely with CIHR to enhance and improve organizational processes and practices.

## Tender Requirements

The tenderer must have expertise in change management, group facilitation, and mediation. They must be able to provide clear recommendations for the enhancement and change management of CIHR. The successful candidate will work as part of a team to facilitate the change management process.

## Technical Specifications

* The tenderer must have a Level 1, 2, or 3 standing in Change Management Consultant (Team) services.
* The tenderer must have experience working in the healthcare or research sector.
* The tenderer must be fluent in English or French, or both.

## Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
* Prior experience in change management, group facilitation, and mediation
* Ability to provide clear recommendations for the enhancement and change management of CIHR
* Relevant education and certifications

## Contact Information

The following is the contact information for the proposal:
* Stephanie Lamoureux, CIHR
* Email: [stephanie.lamoureux@cihr-irsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephanie.lamoureux@cihr-irsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-552-2845

## Annexes

The following documents are included as annexes:
* English tender copy: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/25/5353b2d0e054119926c1470fee5ac0ff/npp_-_tsps_-_english_.pdf
* French tender copy: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/25/fb857a4bd058febf3f51ff5b5af01c3b/npp_-_tsps_-_french_.pdf
